description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he's passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format. Based in Taipei, yeehaa advocates for an impactful and inclusive internet, focusing on bringing people together around common values. His work spans various topics including ecosystem architecture, decentralization, innovation, and sustainability. yeehaa's articles and courses explore themes like digital fragmentation, regenerative design, and the future of technology and society.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, blends tech and philosophy to reimagine education and digital spaces. His work explores ecosystem architecture, decentralization, and innovation, advocating for an inclusive internet and sustainable futures.
